## Jean-Baptiste de Lamarck: Famous for being wrong
<hr>
<br/>

<div style="float: left; width: 48%;">

* **Lines of descent (early evolution theory)**
    + compared living giraffes  with fossil forms
    + evolution =  simple to more complex

<br/>

* **(1) Theory of use and disuse**
    + body parts used: **<span style="color:red">enhanced</span>**
    + body parts disused: **<span style="color:red">minimized</span>**

<br/>

* **(2) Inheritance of acquired characteristics**
    + <span style="color:green">changes can be passed to offspring</span>
    
<br/>

* **The long muscular neck of Giraffes...**

</div>

<IMG STYLE="position:absolute; TOP:250px; LEFT:525px; WIDTH:550px; HEIGHT:325px" SRC="images/giraffe.jpg">
